author: Reuters
title: Israel's health minister diagnosed with coronavirus
description: Netanyahu tested negative for the virus on Monday after a parliamentary aide was confirmed to have it.
content:
Israel's health minister and his wife were diagnosed with coronavirus and are in isolation following guidelines, the health ministry said on April 2.
Yaakov Litzman, 71, an ally of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, has appeared regularly alongside t… [+1404 chars]
